home.home_welcome: Welcome to my portfolio. Here you can learn more about my projects and skills.

about.about_me_intro: Hi! My name is Maksym, and I am a developer experienced in building modern web applications. I specialize in React, Tailwind CSS, and other modern technologies.
about.about_me_portfolio: In this portfolio, you will find my projects, skills, and contact information. Thank you for visiting my site!
about.about_me_thanks: That's me! Thank you for visiting my site.

skills.skill_marketing_1: Google Ads: campaign launch and management
skills.skill_marketing_3: Working with UTM tags, CRM, landing pages
skills.skill_uiux_1: Prototypes and interfaces by hand and in Figma
skills.skill_uiux_3: Design of business cards, banners, flyers
skills.skill_process_1: Process automation: from order to accounting
skills.skill_process_3: Experience in scaling and opening new locations

projects.project_1_desc: Implemented a comprehensive coordination system that improves information organization, collaboration, and strategic planning in the marketing team.
projects.project_2_desc: Online store with cart, payment, and admin panel. Stack: React, Node.js, MongoDB.
projects.project_3_desc: A note-taking mobile app with sync and push notifications. Built with React Native.
